h3_title: Secret - Defeat the Stone Vanguard with the Shigandang
content: When the boss leaps into the air, he’ll slam down on all fours again to send out a tremor, but will also cause a stone pillar to shoot up by whichever part of his body you're closest to. The pillar will glow (as will his front arms), and after a moment explode and deal damage, so keep strafing away to attack a different part of his body.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Shigandang.md', within the main section titled 'Shigandang', specifically from the subsection 'Shigandang Boss Fight and Guide' and the sub-subsection 'Secret - Defeat the Stone Vanguard with the Shigandang'.
The content is as follows:
When the boss leaps into the air, he’ll slam down on all fours again to send out a tremor, but will also cause a stone pillar to shoot up by whichever part of his body you're closest to. The pillar will glow (as will his front arms), and after a moment explode and deal damage, so keep strafing away to attack a different part of his body.
